title: Upgrade to 1.77.1 clears stored default credentials
author: hunnymonster
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->

## Expected Behavior
Upgrade should be transparent and not wipe out stored default credentials.

## Current Behavior
Applying MSI installer from 1.77.0 (or 1.76.x) clears stored credentials under Tools > Options > Credentials > The Following

## Possible Solution
<!--- Not obligatory, but suggest a fix/reason for the bug, -->
<!--- or ideas how to implement the addition or change -->

comments.snippet: Triage refresh (P2): this issue has been inactive for a long time. Please retest on the latest build and share reproducible steps, expected vs actual behavior, and logs/screenshots. If there is no confirmation/update, maintainers can close it as stale or not reproducible.
